goal: Create and publish a Google Form to collect contact details (name, email, mobile number)
prerequisites: User must be logged into Google

steps.description: Click on Blank form to create a new form
Add first question: Name (Short answer type)
Add second question: Email (Short answer type with validation)
Add third question: Mobile Number (Short answer type with validation)
steps.expected_ui: Third question field for Mobile Number

steps.description: Click the Send button to open share options
Click the link icon to get the form link
Click Done to close the dialog
